TunableList.name: BASE_PHOTO_QUALITY_MAP
TunableList.description: The mapping of CameraQuality value to an interval of quality values that will be used to asign a random base quality value to a photo as it is created.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The CameraQuality value. If this photo has this CameraQuality, value, then a random quality between the min value and max value will be assigned to the photo.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: The range of base quality values from which a random value will be given to the photo.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableList.name: EMOTION_STATE_MAP
TunableList.description: The mapping of moods to states, used to give photo objects a mood based state. These states are then used by the tooltip component to display emotional content on the photo's tooltip.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The mood to associate with a state.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The state that represents the mood for the purpose of displaying emotional content in a tooltip.

TunableTuple.name: FAIL_PHOTO_QUALITY_RANGE
TunableTuple.description: The random quality statistic value that a failure photo will be given between the min and max tuned values.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableEnum.name: GROUP_PHOTO_X_ACTOR_TAG

TunableEnum.name: GROUP_PHOTO_Y_ACTOR_TAG
TunableEnum.description: Tag to specify the photo studio interaction that the photo target sim who should be considered the y actor will run.

TunableEnum.name: GROUP_PHOTO_Z_ACTOR_TAG
TunableEnum.description: Tag to specify the photo studio interaction that the photo target sim who should be considered the z actor will run.

TunableList.name: MOOD_PARAM_TO_MOOD_CATEGORY_STATE
TunableList.display: Mood Param To Mood Category State
TunableList.description: If the player took a picture in a photo mode that supports mood categories, we will perform a state change to the corresponding state based on the mood that each picture was taken in.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The mood ASM parameter value to associate with a state.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The state that represents the mood category.

Tunable.name: NUM_PHOTOS_PER_SESSION
Tunable.description: Max possible photos that can be taken during one photo session. Once this number has been reached, the photo session will exit.

TunableEnum.name: PAINTING_INTERACTION_TAG
TunableEnum.description: Tag to specify a painting interaction.

TunableList.name: PHOTO_OBJECT_LOOT_PER_TARGET
TunableList.description: A list of loots which will be applied once PER target. The participants for each application will be Actor: photographer, Target: photograph target and Object: the Photograph itself. If a photo interaction has 2 target sims, this loot will be applied twice.

TunableList.name: PHOTO_VALUE_MODIFIER_MAP
TunableList.description: The mapping of state values to Simoleon value modifiers. The final value of a photo is decided based on its current value multiplied by the sum of all modifiers for states that apply to the photo. All modifiers are added together first, then the sum will be multiplied by the current price.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The quality state values. If this photo has this state, then a random modifier between min_value and max_value will be multiplied to the current price.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: The maximum modifier multiplied to the current price based on the provided state value

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableTuple.name: PHOTO_VALUE_SKILL_CURVE
TunableTuple.description: Allows you to adjust the final value of the photo based on the Sim's level of a given skill.

TunableVariant.name: multiplier
TunableVariant.description: Define how the multiplier will be applied.

TunableList.name: value_curve
TunableList.description: The multiplier will be determined by interpolating against a curve. The user-value is used. This means that a curve for skills should have levels as its x-axis.

Tunable.name: x
Tunable.description: x component

Tunable.name: y
Tunable.description: y component

Tunable.name: statistic
Tunable.description: The payout amount will be multiplied by this statistic's value.

TunableList.name: PHOTOGRAPHY_LOOT_LIST
TunableList.description: A list of loot operations to apply to the photographer when photo mode exits.

Tunable.name: PHOTOGRAPHY_SKILL
Tunable.description: A reference to the photography skill.

Tunable.name: QUALITY_MODIFIER_PER_SKILL_LEVEL
Tunable.description: For each level of skill in Photography, this amount will be added to the quality statistic.
